com.worxforus.net

Class NetHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.worxforus.net.NetHandler

  • public class NetHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles your network requests and retries when necessary. Usage: NetHandler.isNetworkConnected(context); //check if the network is ready to handle a request NetResult netResult = NetHandler.handlePostWithRetry("url", params, NetHandler.NETWORK_DEFAULT_RETRY_ATTEMPTS);
    Author:
    sbossen

      • getInstance

        public static NetHandler getInstance()

      • isNetworkConnected

        public static boolean isNetworkConnected(Context c)
        Checks to see if the network is ready to handle a request (ie. WiFi or 3G connected, not in flight mode, etc)
        Parameters:
        c -
        Returns:
        true if network is ready

      • handlePostWithRetry

        public static NetResult handlePostWithRetry(java.lang.String url,
                            java.util.List<org.apache.http.NameValuePair> params,
                            int num_retries)
        Tries to get a response from the webserver at the given url. If a valid response is not received by the num_retries, then it fails. result.net_success will equal false or true when successful. if there is a network error: result.net_error will have the human readable string of the error result.net_error_type will have a string of the type of exception that occurred
        Parameters:
        url -
        params -
        num_retries -
        Returns:
        NetResult

      • handlePost

        public static NetResult handlePost(java.lang.String url,
                   java.util.List<org.apache.http.NameValuePair> params,
                   NetResult result)
        Makes a single post to a url but does not attempt to retry the connection. Result.net_success will equal false or true when successful. if there is a network error: result.net_error will have the human readable string of the error result.net_error_type will have a string of the type of exception that occurred
        Parameters:
        url -
        params -
        result -
        Returns:
        NetResult

      • setHttpClient

        public static void setHttpClient(org.apache.http.client.HttpClient new_http_client)
        If a socket timeout is detected while connecting, reset the client by setting it to null here to regenerate the connection. Otherwise a bad connection could be maintained for a while Set to null to close the connection
        Parameters:
        new_http_client -

        public static void closeConnection()

      • handleGenericJsonResponseHelper

        public static NetResult handleGenericJsonResponseHelper(NetResult result,
                                        java.lang.String calling_class)
        Used to parse JSON response from webserver in result.object Handles exceptions by logging them
        Parameters:
        result - - object containing net Entity object -> result.object is the JSON Object if successful
        calling_class - - String to use to name calling function in log
        Returns:

      • reset

        public static void reset()
        Closes the current connection so that the HttpClient will be regenerated on the next call
